pr_title: [cloud] RFC0007 - Mappings for Cloud Event Attributes to CoAP Options
pr_body:
## Motivation

CoAP uses [Options](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7252#section-5.4) instead of the traditional headers we see in other protocols. These options are represented by option numbers ranging from 0-65536, with some options numbers having reserved definitions in the [CoAP specification](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7252). 

This document aims to associate certain Options to Cloud Event fields (usage defined by [this RFC](https://github.com/pranav-bhatt/rfcs/blob/main/active/0003-cloud-events-mapping.md)).

Please see [this link](https://github.com/pranav-bhatt/rfcs/blob/main/active/0007-cloudevent-to-coap-options.md) to see the rendered spec for greater clarity.

pr_body: This PR aims to add the CoAP endpoint, bringing CoAP protocol support to drogue-cloud. In its current state, it locally manages to (so far) satisfy the `publish` use case.

pr_body:
Updated the README.md file:
* Updated Drogue IoT Cloud description
* Added a protocol endpoint support section
* Added a "Useful Links" section containing links to documentation and the Drogue IoT blog
* Added a community section containing links to the IRC room, bi-weekly community call calendar, Drogue IoT forum, YouTube channel and Twitter handle 
Signed-off-by: Pranav <adpranavb2000@gmail.com>

this needs to be merged before merging the coap-endpoint, so do take a look @ctron @lulf :)  
(especially at the secure+insecure parameters I've ported from the HTTP charts for future DTLS support)

pr_title: [cloud] RFC0007 - Mappings for Cloud Event Attributes to CoAP Options
pr_body:
## Motivation

CoAP uses [Options](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7252#section-5.4) instead of the traditional headers we see in other protocols. These options are represented by option numbers ranging from 0-65536, with some options numbers having reserved definitions in the [CoAP specification](https://datatracker.ietf.org/doc/html/rfc7252). 

This document aims to associate certain Options to Cloud Event fields (usage defined by [this RFC](https://github.com/pranav-bhatt/rfcs/blob/main/active/0003-cloud-events-mapping.md)).

Please see [this link](https://github.com/pranav-bhatt/rfcs/blob/main/active/0007-cloudevent-to-coap-options.md) to see the rendered spec for greater clarity.

pr_body: This PR aims to add the CoAP endpoint, bringing CoAP protocol support to drogue-cloud. In its current state, it locally manages to (so far) satisfy the `publish` use case.

pr_body:
Updated the README.md file:
* Updated Drogue IoT Cloud description
* Added a protocol endpoint support section
* Added a "Useful Links" section containing links to documentation and the Drogue IoT blog
* Added a community section containing links to the IRC room, bi-weekly community call calendar, Drogue IoT forum, YouTube channel and Twitter handle 
Signed-off-by: Pranav <adpranavb2000@gmail.com>

(especially at the secure+insecure parameters I've ported from the HTTP charts for future DTLS support)
